nodes.title: Elizabeth II
nodes.subtitle: Wikipedia
nodes.body: Elizabeth II (Elizabeth Alexandra Mary) was Queen of the United Kingdom and other Commonwealth realms. She was queen regnant of 32 sovereign states during her lifetime and remained the monarch of 15 realms by the time of her death. Her reign of over 70 years is the longest of any British monarch and the longest verified reign of any female head of state in history.

nodes.title: King to keep his mother's Royal Ascot tradition alive
nodes.subtitle: The Telegraph UK
nodes.body: Charles III will mirror Elizabeth II's devotion and attend every day of the prestigious horse racing festival.

nodes.title: Kate Middleton Channels Queen Elizabeth's Final Buckingham Palace Balcony Appearance
nodes.subtitle: Town and Country Mag
nodes.body: The Princess of Wales, wearing a bright green dress by Andrew Gn and a hat by Philip Treacy, appeared to channel the last appearance Queen Elizabeth ever made on the Buckingham Palace balcony during her Platinum Jubilee weekend last year.

nodes.title: King takes part in first Trooping the Colour ceremony as monarch
nodes.subtitle: The Independent
nodes.body: This is the first time Charles has taken part in the annual ceremony on Horse Guards Parade in Whitehall as the head of state.
